input_text:
Job Title: Concrete Project Executive

Location: Atlanta, GA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Management, Project Management

Description:
Job Title: Concrete Project Executive
Location: Atlanta, GA
Company Overview:We are a leading construction firm specializing in concrete construction projects in Atlanta, GA, and the surrounding areas. With a focus on quality, innovation, and client satisfaction, we deliver a wide range of concrete solutions, including tiltwall and structural concrete, to our diverse portfolio of clients. As we continue to expand our operations, we are seeking a talented and experienced Concrete Project Executive to join our team and lead our concrete projects to successful completion.
Job Description:As a Concrete Project Executive, you will be responsible for overseeing all aspects of our concrete construction projects, with a particular focus on tiltwall and structural concrete. You will serve as the primary point of contact for clients, architects, engineers, subcontractors, and internal teams, ensuring that projects are executed to the highest standards of quality, safety, and efficiency. Your leadership, technical expertise, and strategic vision will be instrumental in driving project success and exceeding client expectations.
Responsibilities:
Lead the planning, execution, and delivery of tiltwall and structural concrete projects from inception to completion.Collaborate with clients, architects, engineers, and subcontractors to develop project plans, schedules, and budgets.Oversee the procurement of materials, equipment, and subcontractor services to support project requirements.Manage project resources, including personnel, equipment, and materials, to optimize productivity and efficiency.Conduct regular site visits and inspections to monitor progress, quality, and safety compliance.Proactively identify and mitigate project risks, conflicts, and challenges to keep projects on track.Provide leadership and mentorship to project teams, including project managers, superintendents, and field personnel.Foster a culture of teamwork, collaboration, and accountability among project stakeholders.Communicate effectively with clients and project stakeholders to provide updates, address concerns, and resolve issues.Ensure adherence to company policies, procedures, and quality standards throughout the project lifecycle.
Requirements:
Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering, Construction Management, or related field (preferred).Minimum of 10 years of experience in concrete construction, with a focus on tiltwall and structural concrete.Proven track record of successfully managing large-scale concrete projects from conception to completion.Strong technical knowledge of concrete construction methods, materials, and techniques.Excellent leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills.Proficiency in project management software and Microsoft Office Suite.Ability to read and interpret construction drawings, specifications, and contracts.Detail-oriented with a commitment to quality, safety, and client satisfaction.Strong problem-solving skills and ability to make informed decisions under pressure.Professional certifications or licenses (e.g., PE, PMP) are a plus.
Join our team at [Company Name] and be part of our mission to deliver exceptional concrete construction projects in Atlanta, GA. We offer competitive compensation, opportunities for career advancement, and a dynamic work environment where your contributions are valued and recognized. If you are a strategic leader with a passion for concrete construction and a proven track record of success, we encourage you to apply today!

Experience Level (if available): Director

output_json.title: Concrete Project Executive
output_json.summary: A leading construction firm specializing in concrete construction projects seeks a Concrete Project Executive to oversee all aspects of concrete projects, focusing on tiltwall and structural concrete.
job_responsibilities: Lead the planning, execution, and delivery of tiltwall and structural concrete projects.
Collaborate with clients, architects, engineers, and subcontractors to develop project plans, schedules, and budgets.
Oversee the procurement of materials, equipment, and subcontractor services.
Manage project resources, including personnel, equipment, and materials.
Conduct regular site visits and inspections.
Proactively identify and mitigate project risks.
Provide leadership and mentorship to project teams.
Foster a culture of teamwork and accountability.
Communicate effectively with clients and project stakeholders.
Ensure adherence to company policies, procedures, and quality standards.
output_json.company_information: Leading construction firm specializing in concrete construction projects in Atlanta, GA.
